episode.title: Apple Is Not a 4-Star Company
episode.rawTitle: 264: ‘Apple Is Not a 4-Star Company’ With Joanna Stern
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Very special guest Joanna Stern returns to the show. Topics include Apple’s event earlier this month, the iPhone 11 and 11 Pro, iOS 13, and how we go about writing (and shooting) our product reviews.
episode.showNotes:
Very special guest Joanna Stern returns to the show. Topics include Apple’s event earlier this month, the iPhone 11 and 11 Pro, iOS 13, and how we go about writing (and shooting) our product reviews.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
